item.title: Git_Notebook
item.description: Git_Notebook Debian/Ubuntu安装Git # For the latest stable version for your release of Debian/Ubuntu sudo apt install git # For Ubuntu, this PPA provides the latest stable upstream Git version sudo add-apt-repository ppa:git-core/ppa sudo apt update sudo apt install git 使用git的最小配置 git config --global user.name
